required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Pilot of Mpowerment for Young Men Who Have Sex With Men (YMSM) in Beirut
clinical_study.official_title: Pilot of Culturally Tailored Mpowerment for HIV Prevention Among YMSM in Beirut

collaborator.agency: Arab Foundation for Freedom and Equality

brief_summary.textblock: This project will adapt and pilot a multi-level, community-based intervention to promote HIV prevention and sexual health among young men who have sex with men in Beirut.

detailed_description.textblock: Mpowerment (MP) is an evidence-based community-level, structural, social and behavioral intervention for HIV prevention developed for YMSM that targets individual and community empowerment and mobilization, self-affirmation, sexual self-knowledge, and creation of a supportive social environment. MP has been widely used in the U.S., but not in a mostly Muslim setting. This project will adapt and pilot MP for the sociocultural issues facing YMSM (age 18-29) in Beirut. There will be a 2-year pilot implementation of MP, with longitudinal cohorts of YMSM in Beirut and Jounieh, the latter being the control community. Primary outcomes will be unprotected anal sex and HIV testing, with secondary outcomes being engagement in peer outreach, and perceived peer norms related to condom use and HIV testing.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Intervention will be evaluated with community cohort and use of pre- post-intervention analysis plan

primary_outcome.description: condomless anal sex with HIV+ or unknown status partners in past 3 months will be assessed via questionnaire
Variable will be assessed via questionnaire

arm_group.description: Beirut community will receive the multi-component intervention Mpowerment; the community cohort of YMSM will be used to evaluate the effects of the intervention on the community, as the cohort participants may or may not have participated in the intervention.

intervention.description: MP is a multi-level intervention that reaches out to all YMSM in a community by mobilizing men to encourage their friends to reduce risk behavior and join the program (informal outreach), along with holding social activities that promote safe sex (formal outreach). MP provides YMSM with skills, support and confidence to find solutions within themselves for sexual health, and seeks to affirm the validity and rights of same-sex behavior and identities.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- men aged 18-29, who have had anal sex with men in the past 6 months
Exclusion Criteria:
- not residing in Lebanon
